title: I seem to be a verb (TEFC)
creator_credit: Texture Films, Arden Rynew and Lester Berman
brief_description: Uses interviews, animaiton, and live action sequences in order to present Buckminster Fuller’s ideas and philosophy of technology and contemporary life.
